## RenderDirective.(constructor)

Creates an instance of RenderDirective.

**Signature:**

```typescript
constructor(dataBinding: Binding<TSource>, templateBinding: Binding<TSource, ContentTemplate>, templateBindingDependsOnData: boolean);
```
